context: Will it works on the new 3ds xl?

context: Is the case red or white?
response: This is a question of whether my South Park inventory is original edition or red, Greatest Hits edition. I believe ours were white Original Editions.

context: are all the songs kid appropriate?
response: Hi Mandy,Unfortunately, I don't recall any curse words but they are the actual songs word for word. If you don't feel comfortable with purchasing this specific one, purchase "Just Dance for Kids 2014". I'm sure its just as good.

context: Is there anything included in the box that would discourage buying it used (Xbox One version)?
response: Not reallyBut the game itself was boring personally

context: Is there a risk of over charging the batteries and shortening their lifespan?
response: Not at all! I keep my controls at charge all the time and I haven't noticed lifespan shortening.

context: Does this come with DLC's?
response: Sadly, no, just the main games

context: Does this include the Arcade version of Smash TV?Not the rated G SNES version right?
response: Yes. If you are thinking about this game just get it. It's a blast! You can't go wrong with the price.

context: How much gore and eschatology does it have? Can it be reduced/censored?
response: Can't be reduced or censored! Have a lot of gore!

context: is this just the fist game converted to 360 or a completly new game that takes place after fable 3
response: It's re-mastered is all, they added new quests, a few other things, and upgraded the graphics, other than that it's the same Fable: TLC game.

context: DOES IT HAVE  CARD GAME MEMORY MATCH
response: Yes, my game does have the Memory Match game listed.

context: can you play regular ds games on this unit?
response: Yes sir, you can play ds/dsi games on the 3ds but you can't play 3ds games on any thing. If you set up an eshop (Nintendos version of digital game distribution) you can download older games, as well.

context: what is different from this one and the other one bellow it?
response: I see someone else was confused as to what item you are referring too, however, I can say this particular item came with a gigantic foldout poster and full game manual that may not have come with every disc.  Other than that, I will need some more information to more thoughtfully answer you inquiry.

context: Hi there, we are looking to purchase a copy of Battlefield 4. Does this come in a premium edition similar to Battlefield 3? thanks Connor.
response: I'm sorry, I don't know. I only bought this for my brother.

context: I bought this hard drive a year ago and it does not work. The xbox will not recognize this drive. Is there a warranty ?
response: The one I bought had a 30 day warrantee from the seller. Did you check with the seller you bought from to see if they had a warrantee? not all sellers do this.

context: can i use this for pc gaming?
response: Yes you can but you need the software to down low onto the computer

context: Any download codes included with this game or is the entire experience in the cartridge?
response: It's the entire experience. All 5 episodes plus 500 days. Main reason I got it. I use analog sticks to move and touchscreen for those quick time events.

context: Does this game require an HD TV?
response: No. We play it on a regular TV.

context: Will this work with windows 8.1?
response: The answer is a yes and a no, yes the RECEIVER works but no the CD doesn't work and the only thing you can use it for is a flying disk, but you to download some stuff for the receiver to work so search some tutorials for how to do it on YouTube

context: I personally loved this game on Xbone, but now I want it on PC. Is there anyone else still online? Spare the negitivity, I've already read the reviews
response: I have it for the pc.  I never had if for the XBOX so i can't compare As you will.  I love it and the price was perfect on Amazon much lower than Steam.  I hope this helps.   Aj

context: do you need to have the transfer cable for this hard drive?
response: Only if you are going to transfer from one Hard drive to another. You don't need the cable if all your going to do is plug it into a 4 gb xbox.

context: What key type is this? I'm guessing rubber dome?
response: It is more of a soft plastic but the keys are QUIET my BF used to sound so loud when typing but not anymore!

context: What is the difference between PSvitaTV and regular PlayStationTV?
response: PlayStationTV used to be called psv tv, they are same item.

context: I thought that older games, such as MGS2, were not backward compatible with the PS3. Will ALL these games work on the PS3 Super Slim?
response: You can play all these games on the PS3

context: could it run on a mac?
response: If I remember correctly the game I bought was specifically for Windows. I would look at the game details just to make sure you can run it on a mac.

context: Does this wheel only turn 90 degrees left and right?
response: It is something like that, half a turn to the left and right, and that is more than enough to turn race cars.  I mainly use the wheel for formula cars which are steered with small turns.

context: can I use on mac?
response: I honestly don't know but I would imagine so

response: So far I now is that Titanfall is the only online game all around even the story mode
